00088         bot = b->bot;

00093 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void BodyCluster::Add(Body *b) {
00095         int N = sub.GetCount();
00096         if (N) {
00097                 bot.x = (N*bot.x + b->bot.x)/(N+1);
00098                 bot.y = (N*bot.y + b->bot.y)/(N+1);
00099                 bot.z = (N*bot.z + b->bot.z)/(N+1);
00100                 dwell = (N*dwell + b->dwell)/(N+1);
00101                 double cc = (N*cos(orientation) + cos(b->orientation))/(N+1);
00102                 double ss = (N*sin(orientation) + sin(b->orientation))/(N+1);
00103                 orientation = atan2(ss, cc);
00104         }
00105         else {
00106                 id = b->id;
00107                 bot = b->bot;
00108                 orientation = b->orientation;
00109                 dwell = b->dwell ? 1 : 0;
00110         }
00111         sub.Add(new BodyClusterElement(b->id, b->bot, b->orientation, b->dwell ? 1 : 0));
00112 }
00113 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 bool BodyCluster::In(int id) {
00115         for (int i=0;i<sub.GetCount();i++)
00116                 if (sub[i]->id == id)
00117                         return true;
00118         return false;
00119 }
00120 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 BodyClusterElement* BodyCluster::Find(int id) {
00122         for (int i=0;i<sub.GetCount();i++)
00123                 if (sub[i]->id == id)
00124                         return sub[i];
00125         return NULL;
00126 }
00127 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 void BodyCluster::Add(BodyClusterElement *b) {
00129         int N = sub.GetCount();
00130         if (N) {
00131                 bot.x = (N*bot.x + b->bot.x)/(N+1);
00132                 bot.y = (N*bot.y + b->bot.y)/(N+1);
00133                 bot.z = (N*bot.z + b->bot.z)/(N+1);
00134                 dwell = (N*dwell + b->dwell)/(N+1);
00135                 double cc = (N*cos(orientation) + cos(b->orientation))/(N+1);
00136                 double ss = (N*sin(orientation) + sin(b->orientation))/(N+1);
00137                 orientation = atan2(ss, cc);
00138         }
00139         else {
00140                 id = b->id;
00141                 bot = b->bot;
00142                 orientation = b->orientation;
00143                 dwell = b->dwell ? 1 : 0;
00144         }
00145         sub.Add(new BodyClusterElement(b->id, b->bot, b->orientation, b->dwell ? 1 : 0));
00146 }
00147 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 void BodyCluster::Add(BodyCluster *b) {
00149         // TODO: N == 0 case
00150         int N = sub.GetCount();
00151         int M = b->sub.GetCount();
00152         bot.x = (N*bot.x + M*b->bot.x)/(N+M);
00153         bot.y = (N*bot.y + M*b->bot.y)/(N+M);
00154         bot.z = (N*bot.z + M*b->bot.z)/(N+M);
00155         dwell = (N*dwell + M*(b->dwell ? 1 : 0))/(N+M);
00156         double cc = (N*cos(orientation) + M*cos(b->orientation))/(N+M);
00157         double ss = (N*sin(orientation) + M*sin(b->orientation))/(N+M);
00158         orientation = atan2(ss, cc);
00159         sub.Append(b->sub);
00160 }
00161 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 void BodyCluster::Clear() {
00163         sub.RemoveAll();
00164 }
00165 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 double ComputeInterDistance(SmartPtrArray<BodyCluster>& cl, SwarmEventDetector* comp) {
00167         double min_dist = DBL_MAX;
00168         for (int i=0;i<cl.GetCount();i++)
00169                 for (int j=0;j<i;j++)
00170                         min_dist = min(comp->ComputeDistance(cl[i], cl[j]), min_dist);
00171         return min_dist;
00172 }
